oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Wheland Company booklet, circa 1953
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wheland Foundry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A promotional booklet by The Wheland Company of Chattanooga, Tennessee, showcasing its manufacturing facilities and products. Includes coverage of the company's Production Foundry and Ordnance Department as well as their manufacture of oil field rotary drilling equipment.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Foundries; Foundry workers; Iron industry and trade; Iron and steel workers
Wheland Foundry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Chattanooga Public Library; University of Tennessee at Chattanooga
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Wheland Foundry and United States Pipe and Foundry Company photographs
